conbody.p: You will see the login window ( ) on your screen upon successful launch of the teacher module. One must enter a valid teacher name and password to access the teacher account.

Dialog Nibelung creates a teacher folder upon creation of the teacher account. This teacher folder can be used to store class files, session files, student records, teacher log book, etc. Each teacher has a separate folder with the name being the same as account's name.
conbody.note: The Setup Wizard creates an account with Admin user name and Admin password (case sensitive) for administration of Dialog Nibelung.
It is imperative to change Admin password upon the first login into the system. Failure to do so will put your classroom into an extremely vulnerable position for computer intrusion.
conbody.p: You can change the teacher at any time during the session by selecting FileChange teacher from the menu. A Teacher login window ( ) will appear on your screen.

Select FileAccount management from the menu to add and remove teacher accounts or to change an account password. A Manage teacher accounts window ( ) will appear on your screen. This window has a list of teacher accounts and Add, Delete, and Change password buttons.
conbody.note: Please note that you can only add or remove accounts when you are logged in as Admin.
conbody.p: An Add teacher account window ( ) will appear on your screen upon pressing the Add button. You should enter teacher's name, password, and confirm the password. The system will automatically put a link to teacher folder for this account on the desktop if the Add teacher folder link to desktop check box is selected.
Select a teacher's name from the list and press the Delete button to remove an account from the system.
Confirm your actions in the Remove teacher account window ( ) that will appear next.

Select a teacher's name from the list and press the Change password button to change account password. A Password change window ( ) will appear on your screen. Enter the old password, new password, and confirm the new password. Press the Change button to apply the new password.
